comment: She is the worst. Not good at explaining. She makes up her exam problems that don't work out. The class is difficult enough, why make it harder? See all the other frown faces. Stay away from this teacher.

the best way to describe her method of teaching is building a pyramid. she sets a decent foundation then screws it up from there. she gives you the basic tools, but her examples have to many errors to be useful

Terrible at answering questions. She is a really sweet lady just a little odd and not very good at teaching. She would be an excellent elementary teacher because most of her examples are childish.  She is a smart lady but not good at teaching.
